name: Space Harrier II
overview: You assume the role of the Space Harrier in your quest to rid the Fantasy Land of the cruel tyranny imposed by the Dark Harrier. To succeed you must battle your way through twelve levels of awesome dangers. Each level culminates in a terrying guardian which must be overcome in order to proceed to the next round. Once all twelve levels have been completed you move into the final conflict. In this round you will have to meet all twelve guardians before the ultimate battle with the Dark Harrier.
